android.name: Orange Peel FacePack
android.content:
Grind the dried Orange Peels till you get a powder. Mix a tablespoon of this powder with yogurt till you get a smooth paste. 
 Apply this paste to your face and keep it on for about 20 minutes. Rinse with Cold Water.

android.name: Yogurt & Lemon Facepack
android.content:
Mix the yogurt and lemon juice thoroughly.
Apply the paste on face and leave it for 20 minutes. Wash with Cold Water.

android.name: Milk & Saffron
android.content: Mix Milk and Saffron. Let Saffron stay for 3-4 hours.Wash your face, pat dry, apply this mix and keep it for 20 minutes. Wash with lukewarm water.

android.name: Potato Pulp Facepack
android.content:
Apply the potato pulp on your face and let it stay for 20 Minutes.
 Potato Pulp ensures face is moisturized always.
Wash off with Plain Water.

android.name: Coconut Facepack
android.content: Extract coconut milk about half cup or so first. Then take a thick bottomed pan and pour the coconut milk in it. Keep the pan on low flame and heat it. Some time later the coconut milk will get clearer and turn into oil. Turn off the gas and let the oil cool down. Add a pinch of turmeric to this oil and apply it daily half an hour before bath. Wash it off with gram flour.

android.name: Cucumber AloeVera Facepack
android.content: Mix the 1/4th grated cucumber and 1 Tablespoon of aloe gel. Carefully apply the mixture on the face and also on your neck.3. Leave it on for 15 minutes. Wash with warm water.

android.name: Almond Facepack
android.content: To prepare this face pack, soak 3-5 almond in milk at night and the next day crush them with milk to make a granular paste. Apply that paste on the face for 20 minutes or when it gets completely dry. Wash this with cold water. This is the best almond face pack to all skin types to get fair complexion and smooth skin.
